content:
Sure, here are some examples of perks or benefits that you could negotiate for in addition to salary:

1. Flexible work hours or remote work options
2. Additional vacation time or paid time off
3. Health insurance or other insurance benefits
4. Retirement saving plans such as 401k or pension plans
5. Professional development opportunities, such as training or tuition reimbursement
6. Stock options or equity
7. Company-provided phone, laptop or other technology equipment
8. Gym membership or wellness programs
9. Paid parental leave or childcare assistance
10. Bonus or commission structure
11. Employee discounts or travel perks.
